title: Seeing sesame seeds in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sesame seeds in a dream This is what many people wonder about. Many people may see a dream about sesame and may confuse it with its interpretation, but in reality, sesame in a dream has a positive meaning and there is no doubt that the meaning of the dream differs. From one person to another, according to many aspects and according to the vision, and this we will learn in the article. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing a promise in a dream Seeing sesame seeds in a dream Seeing sesame seeds in a dream Seeing sesame seeds in a dream is usually interpreted in a positive and good way, because sesame in a dream means goodness, abundance and a lot of money, but when it comes to seeing sesame oil, it can indicate something unknown, but it can be related to dedication to work without feeling problems or pain. Most interpreters agree that sesame in a dream means wealth and abundance in a dream, and sesame can indicate the dreamer's desire to do something, and sesame can mean achieving a goal in the fortuneteller's life and has a great positive impact, God willing. You may be interested in: Talking to the dead in a dream Interpretation of seeing sesame seeds in a dream Al-Nabulsi Sheikh Al-Nabulsi explained that you see sesame in a dream in various ways, each of which has a good meaning, as sesame in a dream means the following: It indicates that you earn money from permissible sources, and these sources will lead to strength and goodness. Whoever sees sesame seeds in a dream, this indicates that the opinion will have beautiful food in the future , and he will have his new projects. If a person finds himself collecting sesame seeds and collecting them in a bowl, this means that he is storing food and that God Almighty blesses that food. If someone is sick and sees in his dream that he has put sesame oil on his body, this may be a sign of recovery from illness and enjoying health. You may be interested in: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Sesame in a dream for men When a man sees sesame in a dream, this indicates the following: If a person sees in a dream that he wants to eat sesame and wants to buy sesame, but he cannot, this may be a sign that the fortuneteller's ideas are many and that he wants to achieve them. When a man dreams that he is eating sesame seeds, this means that he will have a lot of wealth. If a man finds that he is dreaming of a beautiful woman and provides her with some sesame seeds, and then the woman eats all the sesame seeds, this may mean that a difficult situation will happen to him, but he will find someone to help him. You may also be interested in: I saw my husband getting married Cooking sesame in a dream Cooking or eating sesame in a dream is an indication of the dreamer's efforts to do the right thing that will make his life go for the better. Interpretation scholars believe that sesame in a dream is a sign of success And the dreamer's work experience brings him a lot of good, God willing. Sesame seeds in a single woman's dream Sesame seeds in a dream for unmarried girls often contain many of the following positive meanings: If the girl is single and sees sesame on a plate and the person is eating from the same plate, the vision may indicate a good relationship with that person and may bring her good news.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing brides and dolls in a dream, in full, from the books of Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi?

preview.html: His website offers you a complete interpretation of dreams about dolls or dolls in a dream. It is said that this doll or bride is a plastic statue in the shape of a man, as girls know and love dolls. Since childhood, the interpretation of seeing brides in a dream fully indicates a lot of what could happen to the dreamer. Today we will give you all the correct and correct interpretations of dolls and dolls from experts in the interpretation of dreams and visions. If you are interested in the complete interpretation of seeing dolls and dolls in a dream, then you should read the article. What is the dream of a bride and dolls. Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained to us that he saw dolls and dolls in the dreamer’s dream, which indicates relief from some suffering and a sign of joy and happiness, as well as the elimination of worries and problems. If an unmarried young man sees in a dream full of dolls, this indicates his closeness to marriage and how close it is. Who is the girl of his dreams, and God knows best. Seeing talking dolls and dolls in a complete dream speaks of the presence of corrupt people in the dreamer’s life. Watching toys and dolls being broken indicates that he has gone through difficult days and injustice and perhaps the death of the dreamer or a member of his family, and God knows best. And when you see in a dream that Someone throws dolls on the ground, this speaks of loneliness and extreme sadness. When a person sees himself in a dream playing with dolls and dolls, this speaks of betrayal and deception to which the dreamer is exposed, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of a wedding dress in a dream? Interpretation of the vision of brides for the female audience. Vision An unmarried girl in a full dream means dolls and dolls, which are promising dreams and portend a romantic relationship or marriage, and God knows best. When a girl sees dolls and dolls in her dreams, this is a sign of the family’s interest in her and their love for her. And if she sees dolls and dolls in her dreams, and they talk like people, this is evidence On her maturity and great mind, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing blood in a dream, complete with details? Why do you dream of seeing dolls for a married woman? It is said in the interpretation books that a married woman buys a new bride in a complete dream, and this is good news of the approaching pregnancy and childbirth, and God knows best. If she sees herself In a full dream while she is caring for a doll, this indicates good food that will come and the satisfaction of her desires in the near future. See also: Why does a tree dream in a full dream? Why does a bride dream in a full dream of a pregnant woman? It is said that when seeing dolls and pregnant brides shows kindness, support and ease of giving birth without Problems and fatigue. Seeing a bride speaking in a dream full of pregnancy indicates the birth of a girl, and God knows best. Read also: Why dream of seeing a doll in a dream is complete? Dreaming of a doll in a dream is complete. They say that seeing dolls in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams and the desire for happiness and success, and God knows best. Seeing the bride moving in a dream means success and success at work or study. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a camel in a dream and its meaning? If you have a dream that you want to interpret, leave it in a comment below and our team will answer you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs in a dream for a divorced, single or married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about climbing stairs in a dream for a divorced, single, or married woman. It is one of the dreams that haunt people and is referred to as a means of reaching buildings and upper floors in a dream. The circumstances that the dreamer is going through and the events that he narrates are in accordance with what happened to him in the dream, and we find that his interpretation is good news that benefits his life and may be a sign of a bad environment for him. Interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs in a dream There are many interpretations related to a dream of climbing stairs in a dream, as they differ according to status. The dreamer's social situation, in addition to the circumstances he is going through, and we present to you its most important interpretations: We find that seeing a vision of climbing stairs in a dream indicates that the dreamer is diligent and seeks success and excellence, even if the dreamer is still in one of the stages of education. This means that he will get the highest grades. In addition, the dream of climbing stairs indicates a blessing in work and the many blessings that the dreamer will receive. If the dreamer sees himself climbing the stairs with someone he knows, this indicates achieving goals and realizing aspirations. When a person sees himself climbing the stairs with someone he knows, this indicates achieving goals and realizing aspirations. Going down the stairs with an unknown person in a dream, this indicates a genealogical relationship that unites them, and moreover it is an indication that the fortuneteller will gain a special benefit from knowing this man in real life, and God knows the unseen. See also: Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of a dream about someone exposing me in a dream and its repercussionsInterpretation Seeing climbing stairs in a dream for a single woman: In the context of the discussion about the dream of climbing stairs, this vision in a dream for a woman who has never been married shows many things and different connotations, according to what interpretation scholars have reported, and we present to you the most important mention of them: We find that seeing an unmarried girl alone Climbing a long staircase in a dream means that the dreamer will marry a good man, in addition to living with him in a high standard of living. The fact that an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream climbing the stairs without suffering from fatigue or exhaustion, this indicates her good behavior in any situation she is exposed to. To him, in addition to her wise behavior in managing her affairs. Without the need for any support from anyone. It is noteworthy that the fiancée’s walking down the stairs indicates her separation from her fiancé, as this exposes her to some psychological harm and makes her sad, and God knows the unseen. Climbing the stairs in a dream for a married woman and its interpretationThe interpretation of climbing the stairs in a dream for a married woman is different from that of a private woman. With an unmarried girl, each of them is different in her life from the others, and the interpretation of a married woman’s dream relates to her marital life and its conditions. It passes, and between these interpretations: Seeing a woman seeing herself in a dream climbing the stairs, but she finds it difficult to do so and feels tired, this indicates a good vision that conveys good news to the dreamer about the abundance of sustenance that he will obtain and indicates that. Her kindness arrives in her home. In addition to seeing a woman climbing the stairs in her dream, this is an indication of the positive feelings that her children feel towards her. Climbing the stairs in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will reach her goals very quickly,

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is worth noting that seeing teeth in a dream is one of the visions that many people have, as they differ in their details, and therefore these dreams have different meanings, and the connotations they contain, which have been explained by many experts in dream interpretation, In this article, we will learn more about the interpretation of the dream of seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of the dream of seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin also presented many interpretations, meanings and connotations for these dreams that we see in a dream, and these connotations differ based on the details that we see in the dream. During this paragraph, we will explain to you. Interpretation of the dream of seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirinho also: It should be noted that if the upper teeth are visible, they are white and attractive in appearance. This vision means that he is a person loved by everyone and good at dealing with all problems with wisdom and intelligence. It is also testimony. On his screen, this is why he owns the hearts of the people around him, and he creates many friendships at the level of work or ordinary life. If he sees the loss of some of his teeth, then he is the owner of wealth and trade. This vision is a sign of the loss of the deals he makes, because he is not good at planning them. Therefore, he loses a lot of money and deeply regrets these things. As for seeing it fall into his hands, this is a sign of his apostasy from the wrong thought that almost destroyed his position and lost his prestige. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing parsley in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing white teeth in a dream for a woman. Single womanOf course, these visions that we have in a dream have different meanings based on the condition of the dreamer, and seeing teeth varies in meaning according to their condition in the dream, and here we will explain: Seeing white teeth in a dream for a single woman is also: If a single girl sees white teeth in a dream, this indicates that she is busy. This is very difficult for her life, and this is what makes her not take a rest. Whereas if an unmarried girl dreams that her white teeth are falling out in the dream, this is evidence of her long life, and God Almighty is high. Or it is evidence of her extreme fear of her teeth. In addition to seeing white teeth in a dream For one girl. It may be a sign that she is engaged or that she will get married soon if she is engaged. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a purple dress in a dream. Teeth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin, because the scholar Ibn Sirin gave many interpretations of this dream, especially since it is considered one of the dreams that many people saw. People repeatedly, and in these lines we will explain to you the interpretation. Teeth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirinho. Also: Teeth that fall out in a dream are for a single girl. It is evidence of the difficult circumstances that the dreamer is going through and the many problems and fears that she carries on her shoulders. Also, these could be Seeing in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of a failed romantic relationship. It could be a symbol that there are some things that matter to the viewer, and she is confused and cannot make a decision about them. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing matters

title: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for someone who is married to Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying another woman, and interpretation of a dream about marriage for someone who is married to his wife

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a married man. Interpretation of the dream is possible from both sides of the joyful news with what conveys meaning to the dreamer and a warning about the consequences of something, but determining the meaning of your dream depends on many factors, the most important of which are the details of what you saw and the circumstances related to your personal and social life. Interpretation of the dream about marriage for a married man Reflects marriage in a dream for a man Being married has positive meanings in his life on the personal and practical levels, and it means increasing his experiences and multiplying his experiences, which allows him to impose a space of distinction and presence in the labor market. The interpretation of a dream about marriage for a married man sometimes indicates an increased burden of responsibilities and the requirements of daily life, if in reality he is suffering from a financial crisis. . Because marrying another woman means new responsibilities and ambitions, while marrying a dead woman in a dream shows the path to what one aspires to after thinking it was impossible. As for the dream of marrying an unmarried person, it symbolizes a new job or a promotion at work and a change in the individual’s social status to... The best, and he may receive happy news in the coming period and enjoy emotional stability, but if he dreams about it. Marrying a woman who does not know without her consent means not succeeding in something he was aspiring to engineer. Interpretation of the dream of marriage for a married man by Ibn Sirin According to Ibn Sirin’s opinion in the interpretation of the dream of marriage for a married man, the dreamer is actually looking for a feeling of psychological and familial stability and certainty about the future and responsibilities that can He confronts her, and also expresses the new experiences he is going through. He is going through his life and his transition from a certain system of life to the better side after a long effort and diligence. When a married man in reality aspires to rise to a position or position, his marriage in a dream means that he is approaching the goal and that he will have a suitable opportunity for his life in the near future, and marrying four Women at the same time is a sign of abundant goodness and many doors to sustenance, reflected in the dreamer’s life with happiness and greater aspirations for striving and excellence. The interpretation of a dream about marriage for a man married to one of his mahrams means his high status and status among the family and their desire to consult him and take his opinion before making any decision and mercy between them. A man’s marriage to His wife in a dream, the sayings of scholars and their interpretations about seeing a man marrying his wife in a dream, from mentioning good and bad tidings, as we see: Seeing a man marrying his wife in a dream and she was a beautiful woman, this is a sign that he will obtain a share of prestige, power, and wealth in his life, and goodness and sustenance will come to the husbands And the family, as Al-Nabulsi says. While other scholars say that marrying a sick or sick husband in a dream could herald his imminent death and the nearness of his death. As for psychologists, they interpret seeing a man marrying his wife in a dream as a reflection of his constant thinking about his desires, desires, or future aspirations that It contradicts the opinions of his wife. Ibn Sirin states that seeing a married man marrying a virgin girl in a dream is one of the thankful dreams that indicate an increase in money according to the beauty of the bride. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a married man. Al-Nabulsi agrees with the Imam

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing buying vegetables in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing buying vegetables in a dream. This vision is one that many people have had and it is also praiseworthy. We have collected for you all the interpretations from translation books and great insights. Here, our dear followers, we present to you the interpretation of seeing a vegetable market in a dream full of pot, for married people, pregnant women, and men. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that buying vegetables in a dream is full of promising and familiar visions, and God knows best. Also, seeing vegetables can indicate Buying vegetables from the market indicates the good things that the dreamer will do in his life, as well as the abundance of happiness. Also, seeing a full vegetable market in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and that many sins, disobedience and immorality will be committed and repentance will end soon. What is the interpretation of the vision of buying vegetables for single women If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is buying vegetables, this indicates the end of her worries and the happiness that she will have. Also, seeing a full vegetable market in a dream indicates the excellence and success that she will continue with in her next life and achieve her goals, and God knows best. This could indicate The vision also indicates her close marriage to a good man that will make her happy throughout her life and is a sign of happiness. Seeing buying vegetables in a dream can indicate honesty and trust, and an indication of the gains that the girl will achieve in life. Buying vegetables in a complete dream for a married womanIf a married woman dreams of buying Vegetables, this indicates that she will achieve the goals and desires that she seeks in her life. Also, seeing a complete dream about buying or eating vegetables may indicate good health, her upcoming pregnancy, and the marital happiness that she experiences. Seeing yourself buying vegetables in a dream may indicate the collapse of the disputes that occur between her and her. Her husband, as well as abundant livelihood and many profits. The interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream is complete for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is buying vegetables, this means that her affairs will be facilitated, her birth will be easy, and her wealth will be abundant in the dream. Also, seeing a complete vegetable market in A dream can indicate the achievement of visionary goals and the ease of giving birth to a healthy child free of all diseases. The interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream is complete for a man. Whoever dreams that he sees himself buying vegetables, this indicates the disappearance of his worries, and the fact that he will do good, and God knows best. Also, seeing a full vegetable market in... The dream may indicate that the dreamer made his decisions hastily and also that he will get rid of bad deeds, and God knows best. Also, seeing a whole market of vegetables such as cucumbers in a dream may indicate relief from the pain and stress that the dreamer is going through and his close and just marriage. Seeing whole vegetables may indicate In a dream to the upcoming goodness that the dreamer will receive in his next life and abundance of food and money. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a little girl in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a little girl by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing a little girl in a dreamThe elements of pleasure, happiness, and intense joy in which the dreamer finds himself. If a person sees in a dream an ugly girl with torn clothes, this indicates extreme fatigue that the dreamer is suffering from. Seeing a skinny little girl in a dream is a sign of The misfortunes that the dreamer falls into. Interpretation of a dream about a little girl in Nablus: Dreaming of a little girl in a dream is evidence of the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer will gain. Seeing a little girl in a dream indicates livelihood, kindness, and good luck. Dreaming of a little girl in a dream, a newborn baby, indicates happiness that will live. In the coming period. Seeing a single young girl. Seeing a young girl in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of engagement, a date approaching the books and marriage. Seeing a single girl in a dream, an ugly little girl in unkempt clothes, is evidence that she feels despair and disappointment during this time. A little girl dreams of a married woman. A dream of a married woman with a beautiful baby girl is good news for prosperity. A dream of seeing a little girl may indicate pregnancy soon if she does not have children. A dream of a little girl is an indication of nourishment, relief from anxiety, and freedom from worries and problems. Seeing a little girl laughing in a dream It is a sign of goodness and happiness. Interpretation of a dream of a little girl for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman’s dream of a little girl is evidence of this woman’s future prosperity and well-being after giving birth. Seeing a little girl, a smiling little girl, is evidence of the ease of childbirth that this woman is going through. Dreaming of a little girl in a dream is evidence of good health. Which a child enjoys in his mother’s womb. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a little girl for a man: Seeing a lost little girl in a dream is a sign of unpleasant events that the dreamer is going through. A dream in which he sees a little girl in a dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s life for the better. A dream about seeing a beautiful little girl Yamun, is a sign of the abundance of livelihood that one gains. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing a mother getting married in a dream Line Siren

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a mother getting married in a dream from Line Siren, in fact, the dream of marriage is one of the strangest things for the dreamer to interpret by the most famous scholars, especially if this dream is specific to the mother, as seeing the mother getting married in a dream is a confusing, strange and surprising dream, and for this reason we will explain it in this article by clarifying the interpretation of Ibn Sirin's vision of a mother getting married in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a mother getting married in a dream Line Siren In fact, marriage is considered a beautiful dream that indicates goodness. In addition, seeing a wedding in a dream generally indicates comfort and stability, as well as a feeling of certainty. Therefore, the interpretation of seeing a mother getting married has different meanings: Therefore, seeing a mother marrying an unknown man in a dream indicates the imminent death of someone On the other hand, seeing a mother marrying an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that her marriage is near In addition, seeing a mother marrying a strange man is a sign of victory over enemies Also, seeing your mother's wedding in a dream with a married woman is a sign of nourishment and affection that will come into her life See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hair clip in a dream for a woman or a man Interpretation of seeing a mother as a bride in a dream Of course, marriage is the year of life, but sometimes rejection occurs in the mother's marriage to another man, which the children strongly reject because of their intense love for their mother and their attachment to her, so they continue to search for interpretation. In seeing the mother's wedding in a dream, and in its interpretation, it indicates the following: In addition, seeing a mother getting married in a young man's dream indicates good things that will come in his life. In addition, seeing the mother in a dream brings all goodness, and from here the mother's marriage in a dream to an unmarried woman indicates goodness and happiness. Therefore, seeing the mother as a bride in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign that her birth is approaching easily and smoothly. See also: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of the dream of seeing cancer in a dream Interpretation of my mother's dream of marrying a strange man On the other hand, Ibn Sirin explained through the interpretation of seeing the mother's marriage that it indicates comfort, but sometimes for this reason the interpretations related to the mother's marriage in a dream carry many interpretations that show the future in the dreamer's life: In particular, seeing the mother's wedding in a dream indicates the goodness and happiness that will come to the dreamer's life. As for if he sees the mother's marriage to a strange man, it is evidence of victory over enemies and overcoming them. On the other hand, seeing a mother marrying one of her relatives in a dream is evidence of her visit to the Sacred House of God to perform the Hajj or Umrah. The interpretation related to seeing the mother’s marriage is as follows: Accordingly, if an unmarried girl sees that her mother is a bride, this is evidence of the

title: Interpretation of seeing hail in a dream and dreaming of hail falling

preview.html: Seeing hail in a dream symbolizes anxiety and worries if it is not at the right time, and worries and sorrows will go away if it is at the right time, and God is Great if He does not spoil it. Interpretation of seeing hail in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing hail in a dream means sadness and worries even if it is out of season. Whoever sees hail falling from the sky in a dream, this indicates that the king is torturing people, taking their money, and beating some of them severely. And if you see that the sky is raining hail or snow at the wrong time in the dream, this indicates that you are suffering from a minor illness and then recovering from it. The dream indicates Hail falling from the sky on the body indicates the loss of some money. Al-Nabulsi said: Seeing hail in a dream indicates the release of worries, the coercion of enemies, and envy, as it contains the coldness of the earth from which snakes and scorpions emerge. Hail in a dream portends honor. If no harm comes from it, then it is good and food, no. Especially if people collect it in their utensils or eat it and are not harmed by it. Gustav Miller says that seeing hail falling in a dream means worry and anxiety for a period of time, but it does not last. As for seeing cold in a dream for a single girl, it means love after many failures. Hearing the sound of raindrops in a dream indicates that you are going through sad situations. Large hailstones in a dream. Seeing large hailstones in a dream means unexpected fears. Sudden damage and large hailstones falling on your head and feeling pain in the dream indicates exposure to harm and damage. Seeing large hailstones on the ground in a dream It indicates the horrors and calamities that befall the country, and whoever sees large hailstones in his house in a dream, this indicates death and calamity. Seeing large hailstones melting in a dream means relief from distress and anguish, and if you see yourself melting large hailstones in a dream, this means benefit and a lesson, and God knows best. Hail that fell in a dream and dream of hail. Seeing hail falling in a dream means good things and judgments, if no harm befalls. And whoever sees hail falling somewhere on the ground in a dream, this indicates the mercy of God Almighty, if it does not spoil. If it falls and spoils a place in a dream, it is a torment that befalls that part. Seeing hail falling on plant parts and plants if nothing is damaged in the dream indicates goodness and fertility and may refer to locusts that do not harm. Hail falling in the summer in a dream indicates distress and need, and may indicate rising prices. Seeing one’s favorite grains falling and being destroyed in The dream means punishment and paying a fine. Seeing hail falling and picking it up from the ground in a dream indicates anxiety about money. Silver hail falling in a dream means sermons and teachings. If you see hail falling from diamonds in a dream, it represents strife and desires. As for a dream about hail falling from stones, it is evidence of torment. God Almighty and His punishment. Interpretation of drinking cold pills in a dream: To dream of eating cold pills means good news, achieving goals, and recovery from illness. Whoever sees that he collects cold pills and eats them in a dream, this indicates wealth, abundance, and saving money.

title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about a valley in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a valley in a dream is one of the dreams that many people seek to know the interpretation of, especially since it is a dream that is not common to all people, so we wanted to clarify this vision, whether it is a flowing, passing, or transient valley. Through this valley and other forms in which the valley may appear in a dream, as we will explain to you. Interpretation of seeing an owl in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpreters believe that the appearance of the valley in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates stability in this girl’s emotional life. At that time. When the valley is filled with running water, this indicates the ease of that girl’s marriage to her current life partner. If this valley contains warm water, this means that this girl is exposed to some crises in her life, which will greatly affect her psychology. It shows The corrupted water coming out of the valley is this girl’s suffering as the relationship between her and her lover deteriorates, which may lead to separation. Interpretation of a dream about a garden in a dream. Seeing a valley stream in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees the valley flowing alone is a woman who lives in a stable situation with her husband at this time. But it is evil to see the valley if this woman falls into the valley, because this may indicate that she will fall into many troubles in the coming period. Ibn Sirin tells us that the flow of water in the valley indicates that this woman was practicing worship to the fullest. Valley of Dreams Which indicates the husband’s trip in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about almonds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a flowing valley in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man sees a flowing valley in a dream, this may indicate that this man will receive a large financial reward in the coming period. But Imam Al-Saidi sees A man falling into a valley indicates that the man is imprisoned or exposed to a major health crisis from which he may not be able to get out easily. A valley is a dream that may indicate the presence of many difficulties and problems in the life of the dreamer. A valley in a dream is one of the dreams that symbolizes the presence of many difficulties. In the life of this person. The flow of water in the valley shows the family stability in which this man lives with his wife. If the valley includes a large group of trees and plants, this may be evidence of the performance of Hajj or Umrah rituals in the near future for that person. As for the valley that contains On impure water, it may indicate that the dreamer will commit some forbidden acts in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about red clothes in a dream for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about the raging valley of Nabulsi. Imam Nabulsi sees that the raging valley in the dream indicates that many changes will occur in the life of the owner. The dream, which may be negative or positive, but it will change a lot of the course of things in his life. If the dreamer is an unmarried young man, then the flow of the valley indicates the approach of marriage and engagement. The flow of the valley in a dream may indicate overcoming enemies at work and eliminating all competition. It prevents the dreamer from achieving a
